About Me

BIO

I was born in Loma Plata, Chaco, Paraguay. I am 27 years old and I love technology. I grew up with computers, and recently discovered web development and design, which inmediatly fascinated me. I started learning on my own with tutorials and videos on youtube and other platforms. I use Visual Studio Code and sublime text as editors. I started creating some own pages, to learn Html5, CSS and javascript. For workflow i use node.js extension to compile sass in to regular CSS. I use Github for version control and backup of my codes.
